import React, {Fragment, useState} from 'react'; import {genderCategories} from './../../constants/GenderConstant' import {maleStyleCategories, femaleStyleCategories, girlStyleCategories, boyStyleCategories} from './../../constants/StyleConstants' const StyleFormNew = (props) => { const [file, setFile] = useState(''); const [genderCategory, setGenderCategory] = useState('') const [styleCategory, setStylecategory] = useState(''); const onChange = e =>{ setFile(e.target.files[0]) } const handleSubmit=(event)=>{ event.preventDefault() const newStyle = { "name": event.target.name.value, "image": file, "labourCost": event.target.labourCost.value, "source": event.target.source.value, "gender": genderCategory, "styleCategory": styleCategory, "selectedStyle": null } props.handleStylePost(newStyle); } return(
) } export default StyleFormNew; {/*
) */}
